definitions.definition: The heads side of a coin , or the side of a medal or badge that has the principal design .
examples: The medal had a cross on the obverse and had a name inscribed on the reverse.

definitions.definition: A proposition obtained by obversion , e.g. All men are mortal => No man is immortal .

main_definition: The heads side of a coin , or the side of a medal or badge that has the principal design .
secondary_definitions: ( logic ) A proposition obtained by obversion , e.g. All men are mortal => No man is immortal .
